formulas.name: BillingFirstNameFormula
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK(TRIM(IF({!Billing_Add_Same_as_Shipping}, {!Full_Name_Ship}, {!Full_Name_Bill}))), "", IF( LEN(TRIM(IF({!Billing_Add_Same_as_Shipping}, {!Full_Name_Ship}, {!Full_Name_Bill}))) - LEN(SUBSTITUTE(TRIM(IF({!Billing_Add_Same_as_Shipping}, {!Full_Name_Ship}, {!Full_Name_Bill})), " ", "")) = 0, "", LEFT( TRIM(IF({!Billing_Add_Same_as_Shipping}, {!Full_Name_Ship}, {!Full_Name_Bill})), FIND(" ", TRIM(IF({!Billing_Add_Same_as_Shipping}, {!Full_Name_Ship}, {!Full_Name_Bill})) & " ") - 1 ) ) )

formulas.name: BillingLastNameFormula
ShippingLastNameFormula
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK({!Full_Name_Ship}), "", IF( LEN({!Full_Name_Ship}) - LEN(SUBSTITUTE({!Full_Name_Ship}, " ", "")) = 0, {!Full_Name_Ship}, TRIM(MID({!Full_Name_Ship}, FIND(" ", {!Full_Name_Ship}) + 1, LEN({!Full_Name_Ship}))) ) )

Flow.interviewLabel: New Lab Start-Up Program Screen Flow {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: New Lab Start-Up Program Screen Flow

value.stringValue: FLOW : New Lab Start-Up Program Screen Flow

fields.name: Error_Message
fields.fieldText: Something went wrong. Please try again, or reach out to your Salesforce administrator for assistance.

fields.name: Duplicates_Detetected
fields.fieldText: DUPLICATES DETECTED: You're creating a duplicate record.

fields.name: Heading
fields.fieldText:
New Lab Start-Up Program


Program eligibility is subject to approval. To qualify for the Strem New Lab Discount you must be starting a new lab or receiving a new research grant. (20% discount applies to Strem Catalog items only)


Please complete the fields below and return this form directly to your Strem Customer Service Representative or to info@ascensusspecialties.com (Fax# 978.465.3104).


This offer cannot be combined with any other discounts or offers.

fields.name: Billing_Add_Same_as_Shipping
fields.fieldText: Billing address is same as shipping address.

fields.name: Number_of_researchers_in_the_lab
fields.fieldText: Number of researchers in the lab:

fields.name: I_have_purchased_from_Strem_in_the_past
fields.fieldText: I have purchased from Strem in the past:

fields.name: Discount_Information
fields.fieldText: *20% Discount will be available for 1 Year after the date of approval

fields.name: Terms_and_Conditions_Warning_Text
fields.fieldText: Please accept the terms and privacy policies.

fields.name: Terms_And_Conditions_Checkbox
fields.fieldText: I have read and accept the Terms of Use & Privacy Policy .

validationRule.errorMessage: Please accept the terms and privacy policies.

fields.name: Success_Text
fields.fieldText:
Your request has been submitted!


Weâ€™ve received your request and our team is reviewing the details. A representative will contact you shortly with any additional information needed and to provide an update on the status.

 

If you have any immediate questions, please reach out to us at info@ascensusspecialties.com.
